title: Man uses spirit level stick to attack another man in Melbourne's east
text:
A driver used a tradesman's spirit level as a makeshift weapon during a bizarre road rage incident.

The men were filmed fighting each other in the middle of a traffic jam in Melbourne's east at about 4.30pm on Tuesday.

Footage shows one man in a blue shirt swinging the tool at the other black-shirted man, as he dodges out of the way.

Road rage has boiled over in Camberwell, with two motorists coming to blows following an incident this afternoon. #9News pic.twitter.com/ZaZOMrBylq — Nine News Melbourne (@9NewsMelb) October 29, 2019

The men were filmed fighting each other in Melbourne's east about 4.30pm on Tuesday

At one moment, the man in the black shirt attempts to snatch the spirit level from the other man but misses.

The other man continues to swing the tool multiple times at the other driver.

Other motorists attempted to stop the fight.

It is unknown what started the row.
description: The men were filmed fighting each other in the middle of a traffic jam in Melbourne's east at about 4.30pm on Tuesday.
authors: Sahar Mourad For Daily Mail Australia
